body_html: Looking at the code it seems like we never implement the ResourceSparseApply* ops for any optimizer on the GPU. So we should fix this by probably auto-placing the variables in the keras Embedding layer on the CPU if in eager and there are GPUs available (so as to not interfere with TPUs).
